stories.text:
I seem to be getting tons of junk mail.

I’d like to find some modern solution to help so I don’t miss important emails.

So I’m wondering where is the anti spam software at these days? Is it a field that is active? Are the solutions like spam assassin out of date or still the best available?
stories.title: Ask HN: What’s the state of spam filtering technology?

stories.text: Do you know a good resource on the current state of printing/pos/fulfillment in the self-publishing industry? Also how to get into airport bookshops. Ok that last sentence was a joke! But learning the best options for printing/sales/distributing is not a joke. I don't need a marketing guide.
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there a comprehensive guide to the self-publishing industry?
